main event: Unidentified flying object sighted over Altoona, Pennsylvania by a pilot of a United Airlines flight.
interesting points: The object was described as being the color of fire, round on top and flat on the bottom.
The object flew parallel to the aircraft for a period of one minute, then pulled forward of the aircraft two to three times.
When the object pulled forward, it had tremendous speed.
The aircraft was at 15,220 feet with a ground speed of 332 mph, and the object flew directly east.
The report was received from Mr. Lec Tedeso, a controller at the New York ARTC (Air Route Traffic Control).
sighted object: Unidentified flying object, described as being the color of fire, round on top and flat on the bottom.
witnesses: Capt. Picune, pilot of a United Airlines flight
